title: World Record Runner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Place a marker at a player's home. You may not place a marker on a player who already has one.
- If there are at least three active markers. You may instead go for a run, visiting every house with a marker three times that night. If you survive the night, you will have successfully completed a run.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Players with a marker that die lose their marker.

desc:
Post 5430
*"Today's the day to beat my record."*
